attributes.action: THIS HAS TO STOP! ABDUCTUION OF CHILDREN BY THEIR MOTHER /VICTIM OF DOMESTIC VIOLENCE/ .WE RUN BECAUSE WE DIDNT HAVE CHOICE WE NEED YOUR PROTECTION...
attributes.additional_details: stop treating mothers wich escape domestice abuse to their home country as abducters! Stop givin their children to violent fathers! Protect them! We dont have rights? We fleed from abuse by immigrant/normaly in uk on marital visa as this is ofter the case/ , wich we suffered in uk to our home country and u chasing us as criminals? What u will do if someone punch u on the street? U will go to police? So why man can do it to their wives infront of children? When finally they decide after years of abuse to escape to their country of origin /HOME/ u chasing them as criminals? How u can call mother of children abducter? Criminal? Dont u have to protect them? WE WANNA BE HEARD NOT PROSECUTED JUST BECAUSE WE DONT WANNA BE KILLED BY OUR OWN HUSBANDS! WE DIDNT ABDUCT WE DIDNT HAVE CHOICE JUST RUN!
